entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wasm Test failure: 'C:\helix\work\workitem\e\wbt' is not a valid project file #94281
  • expose env variable to disable optimizations #94280
  • A specific HttpRequestException cannot be catched and terminates the whole Console App #94277
  • Use Vector512<T> in SpanHelpers.Fill #94276
  • ComInterfaceGenerator produces invalid C# for `partial` interface methods. #94273
    9.0.0
  • Optimize container startup performance #94272
  • Host tests should move out of the build and use the libraries test infrastructure #94271
  • Should we AOT the XunitLogChecker tool? #94270
  • Failing test `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServiceLifetimeTests.CancelStopAsync` #94268
  • Runtime event for Monitor.Wait #94264
  • Redundant conditional in OleDbDataReader.ProcessResults? #94262
  • Conditional in HttpConnection.cs seems redundant? #94261
    Future
  • Asserts from ILLink analyzers #94260
  • NativeAOT doesn't apply `TrimmerSingleWarn=true` item metadata to the command line for the compiler #94255
  • When publishing a Blazor client application, the build intermittently fails during the EmccCompile task with cmd.exe returning an error code of 255. #94263
    9.0.0
  • [browser] JavasScript promise did not completed. #94253
    9.0.0
  • HostedService does not capture current SynchronizationContext #94252

Closed

  • Reintroduce RealProxy for MarshalByRefObject #38873
    Future
  • gcstress0x3 hangs for osx arm64 Checked #94224
    9.0.0
  • .NET 6.0 and 7.0 failing to decompress zlib stream that is decompressible by .NET Framework 4.7.2 #94246
  • Headers for releases / Hosting calling member functions #12574
    Future
  • A question about Math.Round intrinsic on x64 #6947
    Future
  • [WSL] Can't Spawn Window with Process.Start() #93755
  • Method chaining on dynamic object throws StackOverflowException #6937
    Future
  • RyuJIT: Use unchecked writebarrier for inlined ref arguments #6611
    Future
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.TotalProcessorTime_PerformLoop_TotalProcessorTimeValid #86739
    Future
  • The new SZGenericArrayEnumerator unexpectedly throws errors for empty collections #94256
  • Feature Request: Property Injection #92916
    Future
  • NativeAOT compilation issue on IOS ARM64 - losing interface members? #92106
    8.0.0
  • Unneccesary `Task.Run` in Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Host #93970
    9.0.0
  • Playing sound file in C#- using Visual Studio Mac 2019 #44396
    Future
  • When will the PrepForRemoting method be available? #38262
    Future
  • Exception occurs while deserializing a System.RunTimeType Property #80590
    Future
  • RuntimeInformation.OSDescription wrong version number for ubuntu #51366
    Future
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Sockets.Tests.ConnectSync.ConnectGetsCanceledByDispose #93737
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Sockets.Tests.TelemetryTest.EventSource_SocketConnectFailure_LogsConnectFailed #93735
    9.0.0
  • Port of dotnet/coreclr patch #20932 to 2.1 LTS #53418
    Future
  • Trim analyzer doesn't warn on `GetType().GetMethods()` #86921
    9.0.0
  • Access to the port 'ttyS0' is denied #93908
  • System.Text.Json not Serializing nested objects (treating it as max depth 1) when object is declared internal instead of public #94251
  • Add support for making an ArrayPool<byte> with pre-pinned buffers #11083
    Future
  • NativeAOT tests crashing with infinite recursion in Lock #94227
    9.0.0
  • sos bpmd doesn't seem to work on prejitted code #11919
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix redundant conditional in HttpConnection #94278
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Small cleanup for Lock in Mono #94275
    area-VM-threading-mono, 9.0.0
  • Mono Interlocked fixes #94274
    area-VM-threading-mono, community-contribution
  • Use fully qualified names when referencing user types. #94267
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • Make some Span methods NonVersionable #94258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • tests\Loader - use 3 stripes for gcstress #94235
    area-Infrastructure
  • [ILLink analyzer] Fix dataflow tracking for nested finally regions #94101
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update SystemdHelpers.cs #94191
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Tests build fix with BuildAsStandalone #94208
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Swap loadvector* and loadvectorandunzip* #94220
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Stopwatch in TotalProcessorTime_PerformLoop_TotalProcessorTimeValid #94254
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [PERF] Update arm64 Mono AOT runs to have LLVM=True #94266
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix WBT #94265
    area-Build-mono
  • Optimize cancellation handling in Hosting #93949
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Update diasymreader version to 16.11.29-beta1.23404.4 #93998
    needs-area-label
  • [browser] logging and exit improvements #93472
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add some sanity checking for SPMI JIT options arguments #94248
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][AOT] Disable Hybrid Globalization tests on Calendars #94259
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Fix class construction recursion issue in `Lock` on NativeAOT #94241
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix AOT publish in paths with space on Windows #94166
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Interpreter automatic PGO #92981
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [iOS][non-icu] Implement missing Locale and Casing functions #94038
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Trim analyzer: Implement intrinsics handling of object.GetType #93732
    area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • Add AIA Limit #94244
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix Microsoft.VisualBasic.Tests.ConversionTests #94042
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser][MT] enable timer tests #94217
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Do some cleanup on TimeSpan to ensure better inlining and clearer semantics #94226
    area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0

Updated

  • [ILLink analyzer] Add branch analysis #94123
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: morph blocks in RPO #94247
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Report StackOverflowException on NativeAOT on Linux #93901
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • we need to skip the SIP region in the last step of handling the alloc region #94249
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Memory mapped stresslog for NativeAOT #92506
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve and unify debug views of dictionaries. #92534
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [Draft] Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps #93906
    NO-MERGE, needs-area-label
  • Implement StoreSelectedScalar for Arm64 #93223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] unify pthread pool size to 40 #94204
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] deputy testing #93920
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] enable MT PLINQ #94214
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize Ascii.Equals for small values #93191
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Enable IL strip for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Use `StoreAligned` not `Store` in WidenAsciiToUtf16 #89892
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Change several more arrays to be assembly data spans (w/ collection expressions) #93535
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] Socket Tests Disable #94243
    area-System.Net.Sockets, test-bug, 8.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Add more gcdump and gcinfo code. #94219
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Implement StoreVectorNxM for Arm64 #94129
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Floating NaN overflow test fix #94168
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Build Mac symbols in .dSYM bundle, not single .dwarf file #94237
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet watch doesn't respect configuration arg #36611
  • Containers: support specifying a prefix to the container repository #36595
  • No frameworks were found but actually installed #36594
  • TaskCanceledException: A task was canceled. hitting ctrl-c during container create #36593

Closed

  • Is it possible to use Microsoft.Build.NoTargets with no target framework? #36610

PullRequests

Merged

  • skip packageInstall test for Ubuntu #36615
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36523
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2306389 #36497
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Add dotnet package search #36289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • upgrade stage 0 and unwind a few steps that were done for the 9.0 upg… #36437
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch back to the RC2 build since GA has gone internal. #36578
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36584
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Formatting multiple lock statements indents in an undesired behavior #70672
  • Re-enable flaky SquareBracket tests #70671
    17.9 P2
  • Make CompilationOptions.DebugPlus public #70670
  • Line completion forces suggested method parameter when typing quotes, causing an error #70661
  • Feature flag to debug analyzer exceptions #70660
    17.9
  • Assertion in ConversionBase building customer solution #70659
    17.9
  • Apply-all with IDE0290 (use primary constructor) is failing #70658
  • IDE0305 recommends collection expression that results in worse IL #70656
    17.9
  • Running analyzers on dotnet/runtime yields AD0001 failures from IDE0004 #70654
  • `IDE0054 Use compound assignment` can result in compiler error when dealing with user-defined operators #70651

Closed

  • Consider pooling `MethodTypeInferrer` #69971
    17.9
  • CompoundAssignment.Bug1021941 fail in .net7p6 #63221
    17.9
  • Compiler-caused ambiguity (CS0121) #70665
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34301.62 #70662
  • `MetadataDecoder.GetCustomAttribute` referenced only from `PENamedTypeSymbol.DecodeAttributeUsageInfo` should be removed #70338
    17.9
  • Stack overflow in CSharpSyntaxRewriter when running dotnet format on System.Private.CoreLib.csproj #70549
    17.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable specific squareBracket completion tests #70673
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Only change documents in solution #70669
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Indicate when syntax errors are first calculated. #70668
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Invoke code mapper via reflection #70667
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Rely on GenerateMethodBody/SynthesizesLoweredBoundBody APIs to synthesize body for field like event accessors #70657
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid duplicate analyzer callbacks for PrimaryConstructorBaseTypeSyntax and BaseListSyntax nodes #70655
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix `IDE0054` for increment/decrement when dealing with user-defined operators #70653
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: IOperation support #70650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support implicit indexer access in object initializers #70649
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix fix all exception with duplicate Program declaration in top level program #70645
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Convert MethodTypeInferrer to a struct. #70666
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #70401
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Immunize some more frames #70664
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add Experimental attribute to feature status #70663
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Catch connection lost exceptions when disposing of file watchers on close #70648
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid loading attributes for PE symbols for the purpose of getting AsyncMethodBuilderAttribute information. #70625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Fix Crash in AbstractChangeImplementationCodeRefactoringProvider #70647
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Look scope by scope for method group natural type #69158
    Area-Compilers, 17.9
  • [Prototype] Show project-wide first party 'Code analysis suggestions' in lightbulb menu #70621
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Switch MSBuildWorkspace to running builds out of proc #70469
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, 17.9
  • Integration fixes #70635
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Delay slicing in list pattern until all other element patterns are matched #70615
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix indentation of labels following selection/iteration statements without braces #70641
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Compiler support for respecting custom configured analyzer severity settings #69843
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Routing paths with dots #51818
  • HttpLoggingInterceptor is not complete enough to use as a true telemetry extension point #51814
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #51793
  • Perf regression: https, updates #51792

Closed

  • SignInManager has hard coded Schemes #27979
    Backlog
  • Azure AD B2C and Blazor Web App Net8 Authentication #50725
    8.0.0
  • How can I host multiple web apps in one kestresl on Linux? #51667
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #51784
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #51785
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla #51786
  • Perf improvement: json #51791
  • We cannot use services registered in Web assembly in components that are Interactive Server rendered. #51773
  • Radio button checked property not reset after enhanced form request #51429
    8.0.x
  • Question: Why Microsoft.jQuery.Unobtrusive.Ajax 3.2.6 is deprecated? #51516
  • [Blazor] Cannot find the fallback endpoint specified by route values: { page: /_Host, area: }. #51810
  • ConfigureTestContainer not being invoked #51381
    Backlog
  • .NET 8 changes behavior of IFileProvider initialization for Blazor Server #51794
  • Selenium updates are broken #49869
    8.0.0
  • NavigationLock not working with enhanced navigation in an interactive server page component #51436
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • blazor web app signalr configuration error #51312
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • Dockerize ASP.NET Core with Angular template #51760
  • PersistentComponentState: overloads for jsontypeinfo #51790
  • Kestrel options do not apply. #51763
    Discussions
  • Action route starting with `:` is interpreted as `/:` #51769

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Update JS dependencies for `WebAssembly.Authentication` #51817
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Update eslint js doc plugin #51816
    area-blazor
  • Remove Boyer-Moore in favor of IndexOf #51815
    Perf, area-networking
  • [release/7.0] Update JS dependencies for `WebAssembly.Authentication` #51813
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, tell-mode, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Update JS dependencies for `WebAssembly.Authentication` #51812
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Update JS dependencies for `WebAssembly.Authentication` #51811
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor
  • Quarantine another one of the CanRenderComponentWithPersistedState cases #51808
    area-blazor
  • 47569 - Using FrozenDictionary in HttpMethodDictionaryPolicyJumpTable #51803
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `68cd408` to `2c27dd2` #51802
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `7e33b6a` to `b10fad3` #51801
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e47544a` to `b10fad3` #51800
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `1d1834b` to `99a804e` #51799
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • feat: overloads for json source generator #51789
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Optimize CancellationToken handling #51660
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix radio button reset after submitting enhanced form #51796
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • Backport quarantine of ServerWithOldProtocolVersionClientWithNewProtocolVersionWorksDoesNotAllowStatefulReconnect #51797
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Add support for F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46898
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • Show user friendly message for streaming rendering failures #51687
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Rename Microsoft.Aspnetcore.Testing to Microsoft.AspNetCore.InternalTesting #51713
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Fix AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs reorderings on weaker memory models #51662
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs reorderings on weaker memory models #51663
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix construction of AsParameters with default constructor #51637
    pending-ci-rerun, feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0.x
  • Update HubConnection.ts to provide a easier to read order of SignalR params #51559
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • ApiConventionAnalyzer: support switch expressions #51359
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-01
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • Add dotnet-counters console exporter tests #4376
  • [tools][trace] Add stopping event options to dotnet-trace #4363

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InputTransparent with Opacity/IsVisible behaves differently with iOS/Mac vs Windows/Android #18470
  • Slider doesn't work #18469
  • App.UnhandledException on XamarinFormsNav.PopAsync(true) #18467
  • Input Views fail to update styling when ResourceDictionary is changed #18466
  • slow rendering collectionview #18460
  • Forgot to remove PropertyChanged in TabbedPageManager of Element`s InternalChildren, which caused NRE #18457

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.4.8333] [WinUI] Incorrect size of first item with Border in CollectionView #18128
    .NET 8 GA
  • NSUnknownKeyException on BlazorHybrid MauiApp template #18419
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] System.TypeLoadException with .NET 8 #17136
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Maui.essentials 7.096 incompatible with Android GooglePlayServices Nugets like recaptcha #18118
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] Unable to set Button TextColor #17413
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [regression/8.0.0] [WinUI] Back-button drawn only for the very first NavigationPage to be set to Detail. #18064
    .NET 8 SR1
  • What version of Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK uses Maui? #18462
  • Splash Screen has a black frame around the logo - even when forced to white #14527
  • The command interface for buttons - Command.ChangeCanExecute() #9419
  • IsPassword property of Entry on Android don't change the entry appearance #13815
  • Labels in collection view are black in .Net 8 for Android #18437

PullRequests

Created

  • Ignore use of obsolete iOS/Catalyst API until we update to iOS bump with new APIs #18468
  • Prevent iOS CollectionView size shifts from clearing the cell size cache #18464
  • Backport #16762 - [windows] fix memory leak in ListView #18463
    area/ListView
  • fix 18457 #18458
    community ✨

Merged

  • [ci] Bump iOS and Android #18448
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • (Windows) Fix backbutton not being drawn for other NavigationPages #18451
    platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭, i/regression, .NET 8 SR1

Updated

  • ScrollView content needs layout when ScrollView.InvalidateMeasure is called #17639
    area/layout 🔲, partner/hot-reload-xaml, .NET 8 SR1
  • Add remapping extensions for core #17918
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Windows] Fix margin on title bar #17729
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 SR1
  • Add .NET Foundation license file header #16896
    area/architecture, stale, .NET 8 SR1
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Tizen] Update TizenUIExtensionsVersion #18442
    community ✨
  • Merge net8.0 into main #18380
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Complex types: support change tracking notifications #32205
  • Daily Build 23524.5 UseSQLServer LogTo method requires explicit package ref to logging #32204
  • Support ORDER BY in SQLite aggregate functions #32201
    Backlog

Closed

  • EF Core 7 Temporal table save The expected type was 'System.DateTime' but the actual value was of type 'System.Int32'. #32174
  • Possibility of generating migrations with Fluent API #32135
  • Generate SQL scripts to create the entire DB (not only tables) #32122
  • RC2 IEntityType changes break libraries like MassTransit #32105
    8.0.0
  • No extra newline between query tags #32104
  • Temp tables #32076
  • Check if Table exists #32071
  • UseArtifactsOutput causes dotnet-ef to fail #32020
  • When using an `IModelFinalizingConvention` to add a shadow entity to the model, scripting migrations generates duplicate create table statements. #31689
  • Does the HierarchyId is supported for InMemoryDatabase? #32199

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert to latest public preview of the .NET SDK #32203

Updated

  • Refactor out the baselines for CSharpRuntimeModelCodeGeneratorTest #32196

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682

Closed

  • Unknown switch '--self-contained' #17683

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove the 8.0.1xx table since the builds are now internal #17681

Merged

  • Enable 9.0 SDK templates #17684
  • Stop making tools.sh changes during source-build #17664
  • Enable the 9.0 templates #17673
  • Update 8.0 item templates version to official RC2 build #17671

Updated

  • Disable crossgen and zip file creation in the local dev build unless -pack is used #17478
  • Split current CI pipline #17370
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Re-enable SB tests #17672
